articles.description: England bowler Stuart Broad says he will retire after the conclusion of the fifth Ashes Test at The Oval.
articles.title: England bowler Broad to retire after Ashes series

articles.description: Manchester United agree a £72m deal to sign Denmark international striker Rasmus Hojlund from Serie A side Atalanta.
articles.title: Man Utd agree £72m deal to sign Atalanta's Hojlund

articles.description: England give themselves a golden opportunity to level the Ashes series with a joyful batting display on the third day of the fifth Test against Australia at The Oval.
articles.title: England set up chance to level Ashes series

articles.description: Max Verstappen passes McLaren's Oscar Piastri to win an incident-packed wet sprint race at the Belgian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Verstappen beats Piastri to Belgium sprint victory

articles.description: England give themselves a golden opportunity to level the Ashes series with a joyful batting display on the third day of the fifth Test against Australia at The Oval.
articles.title: Brilliant batting display puts England in control

articles.description: It is a relief that Keira Walsh's knee injury is not her ACL but her World Cup is still in the balance, says England's record goalscorer and BBC Sport pundit Ellen White.
articles.title: 'Relief but Walsh's World Cup still in the balance'

articles.description: England overcome a nervy start to maintain a perfect record at this Netball World Cup with a 62-39 win over Malawi in Pool B.
articles.title: England recover from slow start to beat Malawi

articles.description: England bowler Stuart Broad tells BBC Sport he wanted to go out on a high following his announcement he will retire after the conclusion of the fifth Ashes Test at The Oval.
articles.title: Broad wanted to retire 'at the top'

articles.description: In her third BBC Sport column, GB long jumper Jazmin Sawyers discusses
articles.title: Netflix series & structured league can help athletics thrive - Sawyers

articles.description: Darcy Graham scores two of Scotland's three tries in a World Cup warm-up win over Italy at Murrayfield.
articles.title: Two tries for Graham as Scotland beat Italy
